items.description: The reported financial losses follow a series of layoffs at the VR unit.

items.title: Zuckerberg teases agentic commerce tools and major AI rollout in 2026

items.title: Trump energy department loosens rules on nuclear safety
items.description: The new rules apply to nuclear reactors built on Department of Energy property, which includes several currently being developed by startups.

items.title: Microsoft gained $7.6B from OpenAI last quarter
items.description: Microsoft, one of OpenAI's major investors, is benefiting greatly from the AI lab's growth.
